Republican Governer of California signed into law following Bills.
BILL AB920 This Bill Requires the utilities to compensate a homeowner whose solar array or small wind generator produces more electricity during the year than the customer uses. Until now, if a homeowner’s panels produced more energy than the home used in an entire year, the utilities got the excess for free.
